question_text: An office has a mixed environment of Windows and Linux machines. A new MFD is added to the network, but some systems fail to access scanning and duplex features. What is the most likely issue?
answer_options: Incorrect IP configuration on the print server
Mismatch between driver and page description language support
correct_answer: Mismatch between driver and page description language support
explanation: Some drivers may not support specific page description languages (PCL or PostScript), leading to missing features like scanning or duplexing on certain OS platforms.
